about_the_game:
The field is an open field in the desert.

[Game purpose]
Enemies and allies own a resource called water.
You can obtain resource water by defeating an enemy carrying a tank in battle.
If you defeat an enemy with a yellow tank on his back, the enemy's resource water will decrease and you can obtain resource water.
The goal is to fill up your ally's resource water.
After that, you can find out the final objective by looking at the enemy's data panel that can be viewed at any time during the game.

[Game features]
When you want to get experience points, you can switch to AI control while fighting.
When operating the AI, experience points are gained in battle.
When controlled by the player, you will recover a small amount of health when you damage the enemy.

[Make yourself stronger]
If you obtain the sword that appears from the treasure chest, your attack power will increase greatly.
Normal attack power is increased by exchanging experience points for status at the console inside the smoking building.

*Keyboard operation is not possible.
*The trial version is designed to cause a game over after a short period of time.
